item.title: Android Studio emulator ugly black borders
item.description: Any way to remove the black box behind the emulator? Should run a compositor, something like compton Should try to use xprop WM_CLASS For the border, likely a compositor is needed or you can start the AVD without a device frame. For making it floating, add this to your config Floating all windows with “android emulator” header: for_window [title=".*Emulator.*"] floating enable
